name: procurator
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in ancient Rome, an official of the Roman Empire, especially the chief financial officer of a province (= region controlled by Rome)
in Scotland and some other legal systems, a lawyer, especially a public prosecutor (= a legal official who accuses someone of a crime)
